basics.name: T. Michael Clemons
basics.label: Interactive Designer and Developer
basics.summary: I am an interactive developer and designer with 4 years of experience at crafting user experiences through different mediums (web, mobile, headset, and installations), my goal is to work with a team focused on creating intuitive and compelling user experiences.

work.summary: Contracted as front-end software engineer for starts-ups and agencies.
highlights: Contributed to the front-end development of an embed angular application called "Marketplace" for General Motors infotainment systems. This Application has a reach of over a million users.

While contributing to Marketplace app, completed component based styles library for ui, wrapped application for use on android based infotainment systems, leveraged webpack and OOO programming to component-ize and optimize code base, and manipulated and updated graphical assets.

While contributing to Organic, I utilized angular to complete a responsive web application for American family insurance companyâ€™s (Amfam) my account platform which is responsible for insurance coverage across their 19-state market.

work.summary: Worked with a team of engineers to create a suite of Human resource applications to help connect and engage stakeholders and their workforce.
highlights: Contributed to the development of a core asset library consisting of reusable app styles and components leveraged by the whole team and across multiple applications.
Assisted with the creation and optimization of a user interface of a team directory application used by over 20,000 users at over 10 companies.
Developed the user interface of a team member profile page for usage in both a team directory and admin portal applications

work.summary: Alality is the creator of SpellBound which is a therapeutic tool that uses augmented reality technology to help children cope and engage with medical treatment.
highlights: Created game assets in unity3d for a flagship Augmented Reality application.
Researched and effectively developed animation to app production pipeline for assets to work efficiently in app.

work.summary: Complex Movements is a Detroit-based artist collective supporting the transformation of communities by exploring the connections of complex science and social justice movements through multimedia interactive performance work.
highlights: Helped to create interactive installations for live music performances and storytelling.
Developed 20 story arcs for the installation utilizing game development and interactive development tools including Unity3D and Touch Designer.
Leveraged Unity for 3D asset animation and implementation via C# scripting.
Utilized Touch Designer for real-time graphics and production modularity via a node based visual programming language and python scripting.

work.summary: Howard University is a top tier HBCU producing the highest level of black doctorates in the country.
highlights: During the contract I successfully completed over 500 assets including: website comps, video essays, photographs, and graphic designs, for the purpose of university branding and communications.
